name: 抓紧最后一朵
description:
Hold on to the last flower is a game that tells the story of a lasting friendship in China in the early twenty-firstcentury. Two people met in the fourth grade of primary school. The friendship began because of a misunderstanding, and the ten-year relationship seemed to break down because of the incident. The protagonist of the story was forced to make some choices...

the background of the game is based on the first decade of the 21st century. The story takes place in an old town near the coast in the south. It is in the third stage of rapid development and popularization of the Internet and artificial intelligence neural network. At the same time, it is also in the last period of social security advantage maintenance, which makes some people impetuous and fleeing. This story takes place between two young people. The dispute resolution under the impact of the old and new era is ill fated.

the game plot is inspired by Naples' tetralogy. The art style adopts the form of combining virtual and reality, maintaining balance between the two, and the color refers to makaron.

the plot is expressed in comic form.

the content of the game contains a very small amount of terrorist elements, which is different from the category of kesulu and township terror, and the style is more inclined to the alternative unknowable and superstitious in the early 21st century.

the first attempt to combine UFO, Illuminati, lizard man, crop circle, tieba folk God and Lu Xun's style.

the riddle is relatively simple and easy to use. The painting style and plot are both quite boring and flaccid.
